events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer role in our backend team, and our hiring team will review your qualifications shortly.
After an initial review, we have categorised your application under the Engineering department, focusing on software development positions.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will be your point of contact as we move forward with your software engineer application.
We have completed the initial screening of your technical skills and experience, and would like to invite you for a technical interview next week.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the technical interview; we look forward to discussing your engineering background in more detail.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC; you will be interviewed by our senior developers.
You have successfully completed the technical interview with excellent problem-solving demonstrated during the coding exercises.
We have scheduled your HR interview to further discuss your career goals and cultural fit within the company on May 15th at 11 AM.
The HR interview was completed successfully; the team appreciated your enthusiasm and professionalism during the meeting.
We are pleased to inform you that we have extended a formal job offer for the Software Engineer position with a competitive salary package.
We received your positive feedback regarding the offer and your eagerness to join our engineering team, which we highly appreciate.
Congratulations! You have accepted the offer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard as part of our software engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started, including access to all necessary development tools and an introduction to our engineering teams.
The hiring process is now complete, and you have officially joined our company as a Software Engineer. Welcome to the team!
